com.ucsf.core.services

Class BeaconMonitoring

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ucsf.core.services.BeaconMonitoring

  • public class BeaconMonitoring
extends java.lang.Object
    Class retrieving beacon's information and treating them. Use the Estimote API. Beacons' data are shared through the use of listeners. Such listeners have to be alive as long you want to capture beacons signals. Therefore it's a good idea to use a BackgroundService as a beacon listener.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  BeaconMonitoring.RangingListener
      Beacon ranging interface used to monitor beacons signals.

    • Method Detail

      • getBeaconUniqueId

        public static java.lang.String getBeaconUniqueId(com.estimote.sdk.Beacon beacon)
        Returns the unique id of the given beacon. In this case, we consider the minor to be unique.

      • getBeaconRSSI

        public static double getBeaconRSSI(com.estimote.sdk.Beacon beacon)
        Returns the beacon RSSI. Use this method to access this value instead of a direct call, because we might use the signal strength instead in the future.

      • setBeaconAdvertisingInterval

        public static void setBeaconAdvertisingInterval(com.estimote.sdk.Beacon beacon,
                                                long interval)
        Set the beacon advertising interval, i.e. the interval between each beacon try to notify other devices.

      • setBeaconBroadcastingPower

        public static void setBeaconBroadcastingPower(com.estimote.sdk.Beacon beacon,
                                              int power)
        Set the beacon broadcasting power, i.e. the signal strength used by the beacon to emit its messages.

      • isBluetoothEnabled

        public static boolean isBluetoothEnabled()
        Returns if bluetooth is currently turned on on the current device.

      • enableBluetooth

        public static void enableBluetooth(Activity activity)
        Asks the user to enabled bluetooth (if needed). To that end, the calling activity has to override onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, Intent data) to handle the request response. If the user had activated the bluetooth, the monitoring can be started.

      • resetMonitoringPeriods

        public static void resetMonitoringPeriods(long waitPeriod,
                                          long scanPeriod)
        Resets wait and scan periods. The service has to be running.

      • startMonitoring

        public static void startMonitoring(Context context,
                                   long waitPeriod,
                                   long scanPeriod)
        Starts beacon ranging. Bluetooth needs to be enabled.

      • stopMonitoring

        public static void stopMonitoring()
        Stops beacon ranging.

      • isRunning

        public static boolean isRunning()
        Indicates if the monitor is currently ranging.

      • addRangingListener

        public static void addRangingListener(BeaconMonitoring.RangingListener listener)
        Adds a ranging listener which is called each time a ranging operation is finished.

      • removeRangingListener

        public static void removeRangingListener(BeaconMonitoring.RangingListener listener)
        Removes a ranging listener.
